mapper.select: SELECT AllUsers.*, u.mypoint FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN SUM(b.score_change) IS NOT NULL THEN RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(b.score_change) DESC) ELSE NULL END AS ranking, a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, a.name, a.username, COALESCE(SUM(b.score_change), 0) AS Total_Km, COALESCE(GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT d.crew_name SEPARATOR ', '), 'No Crew') AS crew_name FROM user_tbl a LEFT JOIN record_tbl b ON a.usercode = b.usercode LEFT JOIN crew_member_tbl c ON a.usercode = c.usercode LEFT JOIN create_crew_tbl d ON c.create_crew_code = d.create_crew_code GROUP BY a.usercode, a.nickname, a.profile_img, a.name, a.username ) AS AllUsers LEFT JOIN point_tbl u ON AllUsers.usercode = u.usercode WHERE AllUsers.usercode = (SELECT usercode FROM user_tbl WHERE username = #{userName});

mapper.insert: insert into deleted_user_tbl (usercode, username, password, nickname, addr, addr_details, zip_code, birthdate, gender, tel, profile_img, is_info_disclosure, role, is_google, creation_date, mypoint, point_code, point_change_code) select u.usercode, u.username, u.password, u.nickname, u.addr, u.addr_details, u.zip_code, u.birthdate, u.gender, u.tel, u.profile_img, u.is_info_disclosure, u.role, u.is_google, u.creation_date, p.mypoint, p.point_code, p.point_change_code from user_tbl u left join point_tbl p ON u.usercode = p.usercode where u.usercode=#{param1} ;

SELECT c.certificate_code AS certificate_code, c.content AS content, c.proof_photo AS proof_photo, c.updated_date AS updated_date, c.result_status AS result_status, c.result_date AS result_date, o.marathon_code AS marathon_code, m.marathon_name AS marathon_name FROM certificate_tbl c JOIN order_tbl o ON c.order_code = o.order_code JOIN user_tbl u ON c.username = u.username JOIN marathon_list_tbl m ON o.marathon_code = m.marathon_code WHERE c.username = #{username} limit #{offset}, #{limit}
